name: Address
description: The Address class represents a hardware (layer-2), network (layer-3), or application (layer-7) address.

category.name: category
category.description: The type of address represented.  The permitted values for this attribute are shown below.  The default value is "ipv4-addr".

values.description: IPv4 host address in dotted-decimal notation (a.b.c.d)
IPv4 network address in dotted-decimal notation, slash, significant bits (a.b.c.d/nn)
IPv4 network address in dotted-decimal notation, slash, network mask in dotted-decimal notation (a.b.c.d/w.x.y.z)
IPv6 network address, slash, significant bits
IPv6 network address, slash, network mask
An escape value used to extend this attribute. See Section 5.1.

ext-category.name: ext-category
ext-category.description: A means by which to extend the category attribute.  See Section 5.1.

vlan-name.name: vlan-name
vlan-name.description: The name of the Virtual LAN to which the address belongs.

vlan-num.name: vlan-num
vlan-num.description: The number of the Virtual LAN to which the address belongs.
